name: 24/7 Glide-On Waterproof Eyeliner Pencil
about: What it is:A bestselling luxury eye pencil that glides on ultra-creamy and delivers long-lasting eyeliner looks that wonu2019t smudgeu2014now in viral shade, Space Cowboy..Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin E.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens. It is also vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:The Space Cowboy eyeliner gives you a warm shimmery nude liner in the same 24/7 formulau2014so you get a smooth application without dragging or pulling. Once dry, this eyeliner pencil is waterproof and smudge-proof for up to 16 hours of wear. Try it and see why itu2019s the number-one luxury eye pencil.
ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Polybutene, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Ceresin, Ozokerite, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline), Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Phenoxyethanol. [+/- (May Contain/Peut contenir): CI 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide), CI 77491/77492/77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77019 (Mica)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For precise lines: Use the eye pencil to draw precise lines..-For smokey eyes: Smudge out your pencil to create a classic smokey eye look. .-Use as a shadow: The creaminess of this formula allows for easy blending to create the perfect eyeshadow look..-Use as an eyeshadow base: For added depth and dimension, use Space Cowboy eyeliner as a base under your eyeshadow. .-Transform your eye look: Buildable formula can take you from day to night. .-Keep sharp: For easy use and the sharpest wing, keep your eyeliner ready with an eyeliner pencil sharpener (sold separately).

reviews.review_title: PENCIL BREAKS OFF INTO CASING CUTS EYELIDS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this same brand of eyeliner for years, probably over a decade now. Sadly, over the last 2 or 3 years, it has slid so far downhill in terms of quality, it's astonishing. The eyeliner used to go on smoothly, soft and stay put, waterproof all day and night. Now, the pencil breaks OFTEN, when you sharpen it with Urban Decay sharpener, the pencil breaks INSIDE the sharpener and you have to throw it away because it's unusable afterwards. This has happened now 8 times, which means I have wasted hundreds of dollars in these pencils and tons of time trying to fix it. I purchased three eyeliners, thinking the first one was just defective, but all three were the same. I even bought different sharpeners and the same thing keeps happening. The pencil color hides and the casing is hallow and when you try to sharpen, it breaks off and/or sharpens to the point that it scratches your eyelid or cuts your finger. It's a massive ripoff and sadly a product that used to be good is now not nearly as good as a dollar store item. This brand should be ashamed to sell this product. Read the non incentivized reviews for the truth. I am switching brands finally, and I should have done this sooner...

As long as you don't have hooded eyes. It's too thick for hooded eyes. It will end up taking way too much of the space you got on your lids. If you have hooded eyes, keep looking.  I got the shade Rockstar Wich is supposed to be a matte dark purple. Well it's metallic. It's dark so it may be hard to see but it's definitely not a matte shade. I would be surprised if I don't look like a raccoon in a few hours.  Honestly I would still recommend for a smokey eye look but I'm not in love with this product.

reviews.review_title: Highly pigmented with great staying power
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This satin finish liner is well worth the price for me, although I cannot speak for the other finishes (matte, shimmery, ect) as the reviews are all over the place. Texture and application: glides on creamy and smooth, doesn't tug on skin or have a weird patchy finish. Pigmentation: powerful! Rich, intense color in one swipe but can be built upon if you prefer. This color is beautiful with warm neutral shadows (browns, adobe shades, orangey-tans, ect). Ease of sharpening: great! Isn't so soft that it breaks off when sharpening. Sturdy pencil. Water Resistance: once it's on, it's ON. In terms of water line - you'll probably have to touch up from time to time, but what do you expect? Your waterline is supposed to stay moist for the health of your eyes and a foreign substance is likely to diminish throughout the day as a result. Keep the pencil in your purse if that's a priority.  Overall this is a great product to add to your makeup kit if you're looking for strong pigments, great application, and beautiful range of colors! I'm definitely going to invest in more shades.
